resume_text:
Available for CO-OP/Internship Opportunities for Summer 2025 (May 2025 – August 2025) 
 
VENKATA SRIMANNARAYANA YASAM 
Atlanta, GA 30080, USA | (770) 657-8278 | venkatayasam0714@gmail.com 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/yasam-venkata-srimannarayana/ | https://github.com/venkata0714 
 
EDUCATION 
Kennesaw State University, Kennesaw, GA                           Cumulative GPA: 3.85 /4.00 
Master of Science in Information Technology (Cloud Computing Focus, STEM Designated)         Expected Graduation: May 2025 
Vasireddy Venkatadri Institute of Technology, Guntur, India                Cumulative GPA: 3.75 / 4.00 
Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology                      Graduation: May 2023 
Relevant Coursework: Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, Database Management, Advanced Data Structures, Networking 
Awards and Honors: AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification | AWS Cloud Solutions Architect Certification | Dean’s List 2019-2023 
Leadership Involvement: Kennesaw State University Cloud Computing Club (VP) | AWS Cloud Workshop Coordinator 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE AND INTERNSHIP 
AWS Cloud Engineer | Kennesaw, GA, USA                              Jan 2024 – May 2025 
Projects: CI/CD Pipeline for Streamlit Fake News Detection Application | WordPress Hosting on AWS 
• Designed and implemented a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to build, push, and deploy a containerized Streamlit application to AWS ECS Fargate. 
• Utilized Docker to containerize the application and hosted it in a secure and scalable infrastructure on AWS. 
• Designed VPC with public/private subnets using CLI aligned with AWS best practices. Automated EC2 provisioning and migrated databases to Amazon RDS. 
• Simulated Site-to-Site VPN and integrated Serverless Reminder Notification System using AWS Lambda, SES, and SNS. 
• Managed security, scalability, and efficiency through IAM roles, ECR, and ALB configurations for real-time application monitoring. 

Python/Flask App Developer | Cincinnati, OH                             May 2023 – Aug 2023 
• Led the development of dynamic webpages for ResDash Project using HTML, CSS, Python, & JavaScript, successfully launching the first website for over 700 University of Cincinnati Resident Doctors. 
• Streamlined codebase by eliminating redundant segments and implementing reusable components across the entire project. 
• Integrated Flask, Django, D3.js, and Bootstrap to enhance the user experience, improving the application efficiency by 45%. 

Data Science Intern | Houston, TX                                 May 2022 – July 2022 
• Built and deployed PowerBI dashboard to analyze global growth patterns of Pneumonia, achieving a 20% increase in prediction accuracy using Machine Learning algorithms. 
• Worked with Python libraries (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn), SQL, PowerBI, and PySpark to analyze large datasets and draw actionable insights. 

PROJECTS 
FinVest: Future of Data Hackathon (2024) | Best Finance Software (Fintech)                   Aug 2024 – Sept 2024 
• Developed "FinVest", a VR financial planning platform using Unity, C#, and .NET for portfolio management and education. 
• Integrated Alpha Vantage and Plaid.NET APIs to track real-time stock data and provide a seamless user experience. 
• Visualized financial data through 3D charts using Chart.js and Plotly, enhancing dynamic interaction. 

BearChat: Revolution UC Hackathon (2023) | Best Use of Google Cloud API                     Jan 2023 – Feb 2023 
• Developed “BearChat”, a voice assistant for University of Cincinnati students, integrating Google API for real-time data extraction, weather, and location information. 
• Leveraged TensorFlow Deep Neural Networks (DNN) to achieve over 95% accuracy in speech recognition and used Flask for the backend. 
• Demonstrated expertise in NLP, Deep Learning, and Web Development while creating the first virtual assistant at UC. 

SKILLS 
**Programming Languages/Frameworks/Technologies**: 
• Proficient in JavaScript, Python, Java, C#, C++, Flask, React, MongoDB, Express, TensorFlow, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS (ECS, RDS, Lambda, S3), PostgreSQL, MySQL, D3.js, Tailwind CSS, Git/GitHub, SQL, REST APIs. 
• Intermediate in Rust, Go, Unity, Django, Angular, Azure, OpenCV, PySpark, Redis, TypeScript, Firebase, Next.js. 
• Beginner’s level in Jenkins, GraphQL, AutoML, Swift, Xamarin, VR/AR. 

**Soft Skills**: 
• Strong communication, collaboration, problem-solving, critical thinking, and organizational skills. 
• Experience working in Agile environments, both independently and within cross-functional teams. 
• Fluent in English, Intermediate in Spanish, Basic knowledge of French. 

CERTIFICATIONS 
• AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification (2023) 
• AWS Cloud Solutions Architect Certification (2024) 
• Java Full Stack Certification (Wipro, 2023)
